name: h3
description: The 2026 DeMarini Future Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for peak performance with its innovative features. Equipped with the Damplify Direct Connection and Damplify Knob, this bat provides a comfortable feel by minimizing handle vibrations while maintaining responsiveness. Its Anomaly End Cap, crafted from lightweight materials, complements the composite gapped barrel to reduce swing weight and produce a distinct sound upon contact. The two-piece composite construction ensures easy-swinging weight distribution, offering exceptional barrel control and a balanced swing weight for enhanced bat speed. Designed and built in the USA, this bat also features a removable handle taper for optimal hand positioning, and its Future Dark Matter Composite Gapped Wall Barrel boasts the largest air gap yet, delivering a massive sweet spot and louder hits. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
